long_description: High-performance stopping power is yours with these lightweight, thoughtfully designed forged front brakes. The Force Vector Alignment(TM) design reduces boss movement and ensures that increased energy reaches the rim. Oversized linear spring provides positive centering with less tension, resulting in a lighter action. Overcoat(TM) boot system keeps the noodle from falling victim to damage from wear and tear. Replaceable Rim Wrangler 2 high-performance pads are long lasting.
short_description: High-performance stopping power is yours with these lightweight, thoughtfully designed forged front brakes.
